pages.text: $(li)The Bowl are simple wood liquid containers.$(br)$(li)They can be crafted placing Wood Planks in a Crafting Table.

$(li)if you right click a Mooshroom while you are holding a Bowl, you will obtain a Mushroom Stew or Suspicious Stew.$(br)$(li)They are used to create a lot of different food recipes in a Crafting Table.
